title: Generative AI Software Engineering Intern
description:
Columbia, MDHybridCASTLE Program 2025
Sealing Technologies, a Parsons Company, provides Cyber Security services and cutting-edge technologies to the Federal Government. Sealing Technologies is looking for a software engineer intern to join our Product Development team and help build the next generation of Generative AI systems.  The ideal candidate has a programming or data science background, with knowledge of computer science architectures, the python programming language, and a passion for Generative AI and large language models (LLMs).
Job Skills:

Software      development experience with Python.
Use of data      science and/or web application python modules such as PyTorch, Flask,      LangChain, YAML, pandas, etc.
Experience      in use of modern software development tools (git, containers, VS Code, Markdown      documentation, etc.).
Experience      with Linux operating systems (e.g. Ubuntu or Rocky Linux)
Knowledge of      Agile software development process methodologyMinimum Requirements:

US citizen
Strong      attention to detail
Follows      verbal and written instructions.
Strong      communication skills
Strong      organizational skills
Strong time      management skills
GPA of 3.0      or higher



Our CASTLE program isn't just another internship – it's a comprehensive learning experience designed to bridge the gap between academic knowledge and real-world cybersecurity challenges. As an intern, you will receive specialized training, mentorship from industry experts, and exposure to technologies used in cybersecurity sector. This role has an internal job title of an intern with a corresponding base hourly range of $15.75 to $27.30 set in line with internal benchmarks. Actual pay will be adjusted based on an individual's skills, experience, education, and other job-related factors permitted by law.
Working is no longer solely about the job. Here at Sealing Tech, we understand your happiness and health is vital to our success. We are innovative in our approach to cultivating balanced work environments and offer a plethora of added perks. Sealing Tech offers competitive compensation packages, health, dental, and vision insurance, retirement contributions, continuing education budgets, tuition reimbursement, flexible schedules, and generous vacation policies to all full time employees. We are looking for a new member to join our team, take on challenges, be innovative and willing to grow with us. BUILD, SECURE, SOLVE.

Apply now Apply later

Posted 2 days ago

Columbia, MD
Hybrid
CASTLE Program 2025

Sealing Technologies, a Parsons Company, provides Cyber Security services and cutting-edge technologies to the Federal Government. Sealing Technologies is looking for a software engineer intern to join our Product Development team and help build the next generation of Generative AI systems. The ideal candidate has a programming or data science background, with knowledge of computer science architectures, the python programming language, and a passion for Generative AI and large language models (LLMs).


Job Skills:

  • Software development experience with Python.
  • Use of data science and/or web application python modules such as PyTorch, Flask, LangChain, YAML, pandas, etc.
  • Experience in use of modern software development tools (git, containers, VS Code, Markdown documentation, etc.).
  • Experience with Linux operating systems (e.g. Ubuntu or Rocky Linux)
  • Knowledge of Agile software development process methodology

Minimum Requirements:

  • US citizen
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Follows verbal and written instructions.
  • Strong communication skills
  • Strong organizational skills
  • Strong time management skills
  • GPA of 3.0 or higher

Our CASTLE program isn't just another internship – it's a comprehensive learning experience designed to bridge the gap between academic knowledge and real-world cybersecurity challenges. As an intern, you will receive specialized training, mentorship from industry experts, and exposure to technologies used in cybersecurity sector. This role has an internal job title of an intern with a corresponding base hourly range of $15.75 to $27.30 set in line with internal benchmarks. Actual pay will be adjusted based on an individual's skills, experience, education, and other job-related factors permitted by law.


Working is no longer solely about the job. Here at Sealing Tech, we understand your happiness and health is vital to our success. We are innovative in our approach to cultivating balanced work environments and offer a plethora of added perks. Sealing Tech offers competitive compensation packages, health, dental, and vision insurance, retirement contributions, continuing education budgets, tuition reimbursement, flexible schedules, and generous vacation policies to all full time employees. We are looking for a new member to join our team, take on challenges, be innovative and willing to grow with us. BUILD, SECURE, SOLVE.

Apply now Apply later
